item.title: Radius Connect App Launch - Social Discovery Reimagined
item.description: Radius Connect is now available on iOS and Android! Connect with people nearby, join group chatrooms, play the Guess Me game, chat with rich media, and help your community. Download now for free - privacy-first social networking without tracking.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing Radius Connect - The Privacy-First Social Discovery App

We're thrilled to announce the launch of Radius Connect, a revolutionary social discovery app and social media platform that helps you connect with people nearby and build meaningful communities.

Key Features of Radius Connect:

  • Proximity Discovery - Find and connect with people nearby
  • Guess Me Game - Anonymous icebreaker conversations with nearby users
  • Rich Messaging - Send texts, voice messages, photos, stickers, and documents
  • Random Group Chatrooms - Join global topic-based groups
  • Nearby Groups - Create temporary Bluetooth-based groups for events
  • Nearby Help - Request or provide assistance to people in your vicinity
  • 100% Privacy - No location tracking, no data selling

Download Radius free on iOS and Android today!

item.title: Why Radius Uses Bluetooth Instead of GPS for Social Discovery
item.description: Learn why Radius chose Bluetooth Low Energy technology for proximity detection instead of GPS. Privacy, accuracy, and genuine in-person connections are at the heart of our approach.
